remarks: Value of the subgroup left coset equivalence relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
eqgval.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
eqgval.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
eqgval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
eqgval.r $e |- R = ( G ~QG S ) $.
eqgfval $p |- ( ( G e. V /\ S C_ X ) -> R = { <. x , y >. | ( { x , y } C_ X /\ ( ( N ` x ) .+ y ) e. S ) } ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d X x y $.
